name: Wild Black Panther Attack Simulator 3D – Hunt the Zebra, Deer & Other Animal in Wildlife Safari
name_original: Wild Black Panther Attack Simulator 3D – Hunt the Zebra, Deer & Other Animal in Wildlife Safari
description:
Play your role as a wild Black Panther and hunt down deadly animals in the dark forest. Wild Black Panther simulator is the wild life safari of a deadly and much hidden carnivore cat. Control the Black Panther and chase zebras, deer and other big animals to hunt them down. Hide in the woods and move slowly towards the target to kill them silently and make sure your survival by satisfying this beast hunger.

In this simulator game you will experience real time wildlife adventure with 15 extreme forest journeys of hunt and survival. Live the adventures and secret life of a Black Panther with extreme challenges to survive and to satisfy the hunger. This animal’s simulator game provides you the real life animal’s safari which highlights the actual life of a Black Panther. To enhance your gaming experience multiple playing modes are available with free roam mode and mission survival mode.


Features

-          15 wildlife forest journeys.
-          Different animal categories to chase and hunt.
-          Multiple modes to match your mood.
-          Realistic dark forest environment with HD graphics.
-          Lifelike jungles background sounds.
-          Smooth and user friendly controls.
